title: Hostname not resolving due to incorrect DNS server
errors: Ping request could not find host
root_cause: Client system configured with public DNS instead of internal DNS resolver
resolution_steps: Check configured DNS servers using ipconfig /all
Update DNS server to internal DNS IP provided by network team
validation_steps: Verify resolved IP matches expected internal service IP

title: DNS resolution fails due to stale local DNS cache
symptoms: Hostname resolves to outdated IP address
root_cause: Stale DNS record cached locally on the client machine
resolution_steps: Restart network interface if issue persists
validation_steps: Confirm correct and updated IP address is returned

title: NXDOMAIN error due to missing DNS record
root_cause: Required DNS record not present in authoritative DNS zone
resolution_steps: Verify DNS record existence using nslookup
Create missing DNS record in authoritative DNS server

title: DNS queries timing out due to unreachable DNS server
root_cause: Configured DNS server unreachable due to network connectivity issue
resolution_steps: Ping configured DNS server to verify connectivity
Update DNS server configuration to reachable secondary DNS server
validation_steps: Confirm DNS queries complete without timeout

title: Incorrect DNS record pointing to wrong IP address
root_cause: DNS A record incorrectly configured with outdated IP address
resolution_steps: Verify current DNS record using nslookup
Update DNS record to correct IP address in DNS server
validation_steps: Verify returned IP matches intended service

title: Split DNS issue between internal and external networks
symptoms: Hostname resolves internally but fails externally
Users outside network unable to access service
root_cause: DNS records configured only in internal DNS zone and missing in external DNS
resolution_steps: Verify DNS resolution from internal and external networks
Add required DNS record to external DNS zone
validation_steps: Resolve hostname from external network using nslookup

title: DNS resolution slow due to misconfigured DNS forwarders
root_cause: DNS forwarders configured to unreachable or slow upstream servers
resolution_steps: Update forwarders to reachable and recommended DNS servers
validation_steps: Confirm DNS response time is acceptable

title: Local hosts file overriding DNS resolution
symptoms: Issue persists despite DNS record correction
root_cause: Hostname entry present in local hosts file overriding DNS resolution
resolution_steps: Check local hosts file for hostname entry
Remove or correct incorrect hosts file entry
validation_steps: Confirm correct IP address is returned
